content: One-Lined Poem: Featured Because all of you deserve it… Snapshot of One-Liners via Medium’s homepage. You gave your time, your heart, your soul, your love, and your words; you have been rewarded. To those of you who participate in the weekly one-liners, Medium finally sees you. There is a tab for One-Line Poems on the homepage. Thanks to S Lynn Knight for making me aware. This is your reward. Keep sharing. It is a beautiful thing to witness. Care to share your one-lined poem with me on Featured?
title: One-Lined Poem: Featured
